explains: v. （使）腐烂，腐败；（使）分解；（数）分解
wordGroup: decompose into 分解为；他解为

sentences.en: As the waste materials decompose, they produce methane gas.
sentences.cn: 废物腐烂时会产生沼气。
当它们死亡，它们就会分解。

sentences.en: When the plants die, they decompose, and the phosphorus is recycled back into the soil.
sentences.cn: 当植物死亡时，它们会分解，磷就会被回收到土壤中。
